presentation.title: React Native Developer
presentation.description:
My skills in React Native have allowed me to develop high-quality and user-friendly mobile applications for various projects, 
and I am constantly seeking new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer.

remote.title: Working remotely, from <0>Perpignan</0>
remote.description: For the last few years, I've worked full-time remotely. So far, so good. I am dedicated to ensuring smooth communication and collaboration, regardless of location.

performance.title: A special focus on <0>performance</0>
performance.description: I'm focusing on performance to ensure that my applications run smoothly and efficiently. This includes optimizing code, reducing load times, and employing techniques to deliver a quick and responsive user experience.

quality.title: <0>Quality</0> as priority
quality.description: Quality is my top priority in all aspects of my work. I strive to deliver outstanding results by writing clean, maintainable code, following industry standards, and ensuring user satisfaction through thorough testing and bug fixing. I am dedicated to consistently meeting my high standards to provide exceptional products for my clients.

technos.title: <0>React Native</0>, Expo and Typescript
technos.description: The use of cutting-edge technologies allows me to create dynamic and user-friendly mobile applications, while also ensuring scalability and maintainability. My expertise in these technologies, combined with my commitment to delivering high-quality products, results in exceptional results for my clients.
